metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5589 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in cacti/host.php in Cacti 0.8.8b and earlierallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the idparameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5').
